docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Test link to an image end of image test

docs.text: Modal window in a React app The key to getting a modal window to work in React is to use Portals. Portals allow a component to render a sub component but to have it act as a child of some other component, usually the 'root' div. In this example StreamDelete is opening a modal window under 'root'. Portals are described in detail in the Udemy course Modern React with Redux section 21.
docs.title: Modal window in a React app
